item.title: Analogue Journey Part 2 Re Educating
item.description: This is the second article in my series about exploring a more analogue existence. If you’re interested you may want to check out part 1 before continuing. The second part of this tale starts a very long time ago. My relationship with notes and note-taking is one fraught with missteps, mistrust and frustration. I had always been a decent student. Mainly, I would later learn, because I had a pretty good memory – particularly for things that I hear.
